item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description: So I've had people telling me for a while to start up a blog and seeing as though I'm almost finished a fairly large OSS project, I figured now was as good as time as any.
item.content:encoded:
So I've had people telling me for a while to start up a blog and seeing as though I'm almost finished a fairly large OSS project, I figured now was as good as time as any.

More to come!
